short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the UK Food Hygiene Rating to restaurant listings in Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this Add-on, click a UK address in Google Maps to see its Food Hygiene Rating. This is usually a rating out of 5, except for Scottish businesses which use a Pass/Fail rating.
